description:
This is a library module offering the same set of functions
 defined by Microsoft Excel, under Engineering Functions.

functions.name: bin2dec
functions.description: Converts a binary number to decimal.
functions.summary: Converts a binary number to decimal.

returns.description: A decimal representation of a number given it's binary representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a binary representation of a number.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: bin2hex
functions.description: Converts a binary number to hexadecimal.
functions.summary: Converts a binary number to hexadecimal.

returns.description: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's binary representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a binary representation of a number.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: bin2hex
functions.signature: ($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string
functions.description: Converts a binary number to hexadecimal.
functions.summary: Converts a binary number to hexadecimal.

parameters.name: places
parameters.description: is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

returns.description: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's binary representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a binary representation of a number.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: bin2oct
functions.description: Converts a binary number to octal.
functions.summary: Converts a binary number to octal.

returns.description: A octal representation of a number given it's binary representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a binary representation of a number.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: bin2oct
functions.signature: ($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string
functions.description: Converts a binary number to octal.
functions.summary: Converts a binary number to octal.

parameters.name: places
parameters.description: is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

returns.description: A octal representation of a number given it's binary representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not a binary representation of a number.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg contains more than 10 characters.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: dec2bin
functions.description: Converts a decimal number to binary.
functions.summary: Converts a decimal number to binary.

returns.description: A binary representation of a number given it's decimal representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -512 or bigger than 511.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: dec2bin
functions.signature: ($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string
functions.description: Converts a decimal number to binary.
functions.summary: Converts a decimal number to binary.

parameters.name: places
parameters.description: is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

returns.description: A binary representation of a number given it's decimal representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $places is not numeric.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is zero or negative.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $places is too small.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -512 or bigger than 511.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: dec2hex
functions.description: Converts a decimal number to hexadecimal.
functions.summary: Converts a decimal number to hexadecimal.

returns.description: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's decimal representation.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Value if provided value for $arg is not numeric.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -549755813888 or bigger than 549755813887</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: dec2hex
functions.signature: ($arg as xs:anyAtomicType, $places as xs:anyAtomicType) as xs:string
functions.description: Converts a decimal number to hexadecimal.

parameters.name: places
parameters.description: is the number of characters to use. Places is useful for padding the return value with leading 0s (zeros).

returns.description: A hexadecimal representation of a number given it's decimal representation.

<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -549755813888 or bigger than 549755813887.</xqdoc:error>

functions.description: Converts a decimal number to octal.
functions.summary: Converts a decimal number to octal.

<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">excel-err:Num if provided value for $arg is smaller than -536870912 or bigger than 536870911.</xqdoc:error>
